Smooth Minimization (Nesterov, 2004) -- Section 04 -- Part 1

open scoped NNReal

OperatorNormDef.{u_1, u_2} {E1 : Type u_1} {E2 : Type u_2} [SeminormedAddCommGroup E1] [NormedSpace E1] [FiniteDimensional E1] [SeminormedAddCommGroup E2] [NormedSpace E2] [FiniteDimensional E2] (A : E1 [] Module.Dual E2) : OperatorNormDef is nonnegative.

lemma operatorNormDef_nonneg {E1 E2 : Type*} [SeminormedAddCommGroup E1] [NormedSpace E1] [FiniteDimensional E1] [SeminormedAddCommGroup E2] [NormedSpace E2] [FiniteDimensional E2] (A : E1 [] Module.Dual E2) : 0 OperatorNormDef A := by classical set S : Set := { r : | x : E1, u : E2, x = 1 u = 1 r = DualPairing (A x) u } with hSdef -- rewrite the definition in terms of the auxiliary set `S` have hOp : OperatorNormDef A = sSup S := by unfold OperatorNormDef rw [hSdef.symm] by_cases hS : S = -- empty-set case: `sSup = 0` have : (OperatorNormDef A) = 0 := by simp [hOp, hS, Real.sSup_empty] simp [this] have hSne : S.Nonempty := Set.nonempty_iff_ne_empty.2 hS rcases hSne with r, hr have hneg : (-r) S := by rcases hr with x, u, hx, hu, rfl refine x, -u, hx, ?_, ?_ simpa [norm_neg] using hu simp [DualPairing] have hex : t S, 0 t := by by_cases hr0 : 0 r exact r, hr, hr0 have : 0 -r := by linarith exact -r, hneg, this have : 0 sSup S := Real.sSup_nonneg' hex simpa [hOp] using this

Definition 1.4.1. noncomputable def SmoothedObjective {E1 E2 : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E1] [NormedSpace E1] [NormedAddCommGroup E2] [NormedSpace E2] (Q2 : Set E2) (A : E1 L[] (E2 L[] )) (phihat d2 : E2 ) ( : ) (fhat : E1 ) : E1 := fun x => fhat x + SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 x

LipschitzOnWith is preserved under pointwise addition.

lemma lipschitzOnWith_add { : Type*} [PseudoMetricSpace ] [NormedAddCommGroup ] {K K : 0} {f g : } {s : Set } (hf : LipschitzOnWith K f s) (hg : LipschitzOnWith K g s) : LipschitzOnWith (K + K) (fun x => f x + g x) s := by refine LipschitzOnWith.of_dist_le_mul ?_ intro x hx y hy have hf' := hf.dist_le_mul x hx y hy have hg' := hg.dist_le_mul x hx y hy have hdist : dist (f x + g x) (f y + g y) dist (f x) (f y) + dist (g x) (g y) := by calc dist (f x + g x) (f y + g y) = (f x + g x) - (f y + g y) := by simp [dist_eq_norm] _ = (f x - f y) + (g x - g y) := by simp [sub_eq_add_neg, add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc] _ f x - f y + g x - g y := norm_add_le _ _ _ = dist (f x) (f y) + dist (g x) (g y) := by simp [dist_eq_norm] calc dist (f x + g x) (f y + g y) dist (f x) (f y) + dist (g x) (g y) := hdist _ (K : ) * dist x y + (K : ) * dist x y := by exact add_le_add hf' hg' _ = (K + K) * dist x y := by simp [add_mul]

Lipschitz bound for the derivative of the smoothed max-function on a set.

lemma smoothedMaxFunction_fderiv_lipschitzOn {E1 E2 : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E1] [NormedSpace E1] [FiniteDimensional E1] [NormedAddCommGroup E2] [NormedSpace E2] [FiniteDimensional E2] (Q1 : Set E1) (Q2 : Set E2) (A : E1 L[] (E2 L[] )) (phihat d2 : E2 ) ( 2 : ) (h : 0 < ) (h2 : 0 < 2) (hconv : StrongConvexOn Q2 2 d2) (u : E1 E2) (hmax : x, IsSmoothedMaximizer Q2 A phihat d2 x (u x)) : let f : E1 := SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 let A' : E1 [] Module.Dual E2 := { toFun := fun x => (A x).toLinearMap map_add' := by intro x y ext u simp map_smul' := by intro c x ext u simp } ( x, HasFDerivAt (fun y => A y (u y) - phihat (u y) - * d2 (u y)) ((AdjointOperator A' (u x)).toContinuousLinearMap) x) ( x1 x2, * 2 * u x1 - u x2 ^ (2 : ) DualPairing (AdjointOperator A' (u x1 - u x2)) (x1 - x2)) LipschitzOnWith (Real.toNNReal ((1 / ( * 2)) * (OperatorNormDef A') ^ 2)) (fun x => fderiv f x) Q1 := by classical simp only intro _ _ set f : E1 := SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 set A' : E1 [] Module.Dual E2 := { toFun := fun x => (A x).toLinearMap map_add' := by intro x y ext u simp map_smul' := by intro c x ext u simp } have hprops : ContDiff (1 : ) f ConvexOn Set.univ f ( x, HasFDerivAt f ((AdjointOperator A' (u x)).toContinuousLinearMap) x) L : , L = (1 / ( * 2)) * (OperatorNormDef A') ^ 2 LipschitzWith (Real.toNNReal L) (fun x => (AdjointOperator A' (u x)).toContinuousLinearMap) := by simpa [f, A'] using (smoothedMaxFunction_properties (Q2 := Q2) (A := A) (phihat := phihat) (d2 := d2) ( := ) (2 := 2) (h := h) (h2 := h2) (hconv := hconv) (u := u) (hmax := hmax)) rcases hprops with _, _, hderiv, L, hL, hLip have hderiv' : (fun x => fderiv f x) = fun x => (AdjointOperator A' (u x)).toContinuousLinearMap := by funext x exact (hderiv x).fderiv have hLipOn : LipschitzOnWith (Real.toNNReal L) (fun x => fderiv f x) Q1 := by simpa [hderiv'] using (hLip.lipschitzOnWith (s := Q1)) simpa [hL] using hLipOn

On a set, the derivative of a sum is the sum of derivatives.

lemma fderiv_add_on {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace E] {f g : E } {s : Set E} (hf : x s, DifferentiableAt f x) (hg : x s, DifferentiableAt g x) : x s, fderiv (fun y => f y + g y) x = fderiv f x + fderiv g x := by intro x hx simpa using (fderiv_add (f := f) (g := g) (x := x) (hf := hf x hx) (hg := hg x hx))

Real.toNNReal (r : ) : 0Real.toNNReal preserves addition on nonnegative inputs.

lemma toNNReal_add_nonneg {a b : } (ha : 0 a) (hb : 0 b) : Real.toNNReal (a + b) = Real.toNNReal a + Real.toNNReal b := by simpa using (Real.toNNReal_add ha hb)

Linearization identity for the smoothed max-function under an adjoint derivative formula.

lemma smoothedMaxFunction_linearization {E1 E2 : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E1] [NormedSpace E1] [FiniteDimensional E1] [NormedAddCommGroup E2] [NormedSpace E2] [FiniteDimensional E2] (Q2 : Set E2) (A : E1 L[] (E2 L[] )) (phihat d2 : E2 ) ( : ) (u : E1 E2) (A' : E1 [] Module.Dual E2) (hmax : x, IsSmoothedMaximizer Q2 A phihat d2 x (u x)) (hderiv : x, fderiv (SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 ) x = (AdjointOperator A' (u x)).toContinuousLinearMap) (hpair : x u, DualPairing (AdjointOperator A' u) x = A x u) : x, SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 x - DualPairing ((fderiv (SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 ) x).toLinearMap) x = -phihat (u x) - * d2 (u x) := by classical intro x set f : E1 := SmoothedMaxFunction Q2 A phihat d2 with hf have hfx : f x = A x (u x) - phihat (u x) - * d2 (u x) := by have hmaxx := hmax x set g : E2 := fun u => A x u - phihat u - * d2 u have hux : u x Q2 := hmaxx.1 have hne : (g '' Q2).Nonempty := g (u x), u x, hux, rfl have hbd : BddAbove (g '' Q2) := by refine g (u x), ?_ rintro y v, hv, rfl exact hmaxx.2 v hv have hsup_le : sSup (g '' Q2) g (u x) := by refine csSup_le hne ?_ rintro y v, hv, rfl exact hmaxx.2 v hv have hle_sup : g (u x) sSup (g '' Q2) := by refine le_csSup hbd ?_ exact u x, hux, rfl have hsup : sSup (g '' Q2) = g (u x) := le_antisymm hsup_le hle_sup calc f x = sSup (g '' Q2) := by simp [hf, SmoothedMaxFunction, g] _ = g (u x) := hsup _ = A x (u x) - phihat (u x) - * d2 (u x) := by simp [g] have hderiv' : ((fderiv f x).toLinearMap) = AdjointOperator A' (u x) := by have h := congrArg ContinuousLinearMap.toLinearMap (hderiv x) simpa [hf] using h calc f x - DualPairing ((fderiv f x).toLinearMap) x = (A x (u x) - phihat (u x) - * d2 (u x)) - DualPairing (AdjointOperator A' (u x)) x := by simp [hfx, hderiv'] _ = -phihat (u x) - * d2 (u x) := by have hpairx : DualPairing (AdjointOperator A' (u x)) x = A x (u x) := hpair x (u x) have hring : (A x (u x) - The supremum of a nonnegative function on a nonempty set is nonnegative.

lemma sSup_image_nonneg { : Type*} (s : Set ) (f : ) (hbd : BddAbove (f '' s)) (hne : s.Nonempty) (hnonneg : x s, 0 f x) : 0 sSup (f '' s) := by rcases hne with x, hx have hxmem : f x f '' s := x, hx, rfl have hle : f x sSup (f '' s) := le_csSup hbd hxmem exact le_trans (hnonneg x hx) hle

Closed form: .

lemma sum_range_add_one_cast (N : ) : Finset.sum (Finset.range (N + 1)) (fun i => ((i : ) + 1)) = ((N : ) + 1) * ((N : ) + 2) / 2 := by classical have hNat : (Finset.sum (Finset.range (N + 1)) (fun i => i)) * 2 = (N + 1) * N := by simpa using (Finset.sum_range_id_mul_two (N + 1)) have hCast := congrArg (fun t : => (t : )) hNat have hsum_i : Finset.sum (Finset.range (N + 1)) (fun i => (i : )) = ((N : ) + 1) * (N : ) / 2 := by refine (eq_div_iff (by norm_num : (2 : ) 0)).2 ?_ have : Finset.sum (Finset.range (N + 1)) (fun i => (i : )) * 2 = ((N : ) + 1) * (N : ) := by simpa [Nat.cast_sum, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, add_assoc, add_comm, add_left_comm, mul_assoc, mul_comm, mul_left_comm] using hCast simpa [mul_assoc] using this calc Finset.sum (Finset.range (N + 1)) (fun i => ((i : ) + 1)) = Finset.sum (Finset.range (N + 1)) (fun i => (i : )) + Finset.sum (Finset.range (N + 1)) (fun _ => (1 : )) := by simpa using (Finset.sum_add_distrib (s := Finset.range (N + 1)) (f := fun i => (i : )) (g := fun _ => (1 : ))) _ = ((N : ) + 1) * (N : ) / 2 + ((N : ) + 1) := by simp [hsum_i] _ = ((N : ) + 1) * ((N : ) + 2) / 2 := by ring

Supporting hyperplane inequality for a differentiable convex function on an open convex set.

lemma convex_support_grad {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace E] [FiniteDimensional E] {Q : Set E} {f : E } (hQ_open : IsOpen Q) (hQ_convex : Convex Q) (hf_convex : ConvexOn Q f) (hf_diff : DifferentiableOn f Q) {u v : E} (hu : u Q) (hv : v Q) : f u f v + DualPairing ((fderiv f v).toLinearMap) (u - v) := by classical -- Reduce to a one-dimensional convex function on `[0,1]` and compare the derivative at `0` -- with the secant slope to `1`. let gAff : [] E := AffineMap.lineMap v u have hseg : Set.Icc (0 : ) 1 (fun t => gAff t) ' Q := by intro t ht simpa [gAff] using hQ_convex.lineMap_mem hv hu ht have hgPre : ConvexOn ((fun t => gAff t) ' Q) (fun t => f (gAff t)) := by simpa [Function.comp, gAff] using (hf_convex.comp_affineMap gAff) have hg : ConvexOn (Set.Icc (0 : ) 1) (fun t => f (gAff t)) := by refine convex_Icc (0 : ) 1, ?_ intro x hx y hy a b ha hb hab exact hgPre.2 (hseg hx) (hseg hy) ha hb hab have hvAt : DifferentiableAt f v := (hf_diff v hv).differentiableAt (hQ_open.mem_nhds hv) have hInner : HasDerivAt (fun t : => gAff t) (u - v) 0 := by have h0 : HasDerivAt (fun t : => v + t (u - v)) (u - v) 0 := by simpa using (HasDerivAt.const_add v ((hasDerivAt_id (0 : )).smul_const (u - v))) simpa [gAff, AffineMap.lineMap_apply, vsub_eq_sub, vadd_eq_add, add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc] using h0 have hDeriv : HasDerivAt (fun t : => f (gAff t)) ((fderiv f v) (u - v)) 0 := by have hAff0 : gAff 0 = v := by simp [gAff, AffineMap.lineMap_apply, vsub_eq_sub, vadd_eq_add] have hF : HasFDerivAt f (fderiv f v) (gAff 0) := by simpa [hAff0] using hvAt.hasFDerivAt simpa [Function.comp] using (HasFDerivAt.comp_hasDerivAt (x := 0) (f := fun t : => gAff t) (l := f) hF hInner) have hle : ((fderiv f v) (u - v)) slope (fun t : => f (gAff t)) 0 1 := by have hx0 : (0 : ) Set.Icc (0 : ) 1 := by simp have hy1 : (1 : ) Set.Icc (0 : ) 1 := by simp simpa using hg.le_slope_of_hasDerivAt hx0 hy1 (by norm_num) hDeriv have hslope : slope (fun t : => f (gAff t)) 0 1 = f (gAff 1) - f (gAff 0) := by simp [slope_def_field] have hfinal : f (gAff 0) + ((fderiv f v) (u - v)) f (gAff 1) := by linarith [hle, hslope] have hAff0 : gAff 0 = v := by simp [gAff, AffineMap.lineMap_apply, vsub_eq_sub, vadd_eq_add] have hAff1 : gAff 1 = u := by simp [gAff, AffineMap.lineMap_apply, vsub_eq_sub, vadd_eq_add] -- Rewrite back in terms of `u, v`. simpa [DualPairing, hAff0, hAff1, add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc] using hfinal
